mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d') AS VISIT_DATE, COUNT(ID) AS CNT FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = '1' AND REG_MONTH_INQUIRY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d')

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{search_login_id}) AND REG_DATE_INQUIRY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') ) AS TODAY_VISIT_CNT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{search_login_id}) AND REG_DATE_INQUIRY = date_format((DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)),'%Y%m%d') ) AS YESTERDAY_VISIT_CNT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{search_login_id}) ) AS CUMULATIVE_VISIT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS VISIT_STATIS_CRITERIA FROM DUAL
